body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for reaching out to Evans Motors Customer Support. My name is Jacob Evans. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Emma! How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I have a question about the product quality of a car I purchased.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Of course, Emma. Could you provide me with the model and VIN number of the car you're referring to?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: The car model is Civic and the VIN number is five six eight seven zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Emma. One more piece of information I need is your contact number. Could you please provide that to me as well?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: My contact number is eight eight five five two one six three zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Emma, for sharing that information. It will help us investigate your concern. Is there anything else you would like to add before we proceed with resolving this issue?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thank you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Emma, for your time and cooperation. We will look into the matter and get back to you soon. Have a great day!
